segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center-left of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see a "COOKIE JAR" inside, brimming with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand in the jar, and the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch his bounty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems like it's about to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of fear watching him; he could fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That fall could be quite nasty, especially with the hard counter below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene before he topples over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky maneuver for a few cookies, even if they are tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination to get those cookies is quite something, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the potential for injury here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple act, yet so full of peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR
